de.dirkgasser.brauen

Class BrewComputerFrame

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • de.dirkgasser.brauen.BrewComputerFrame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class BrewComputerFrame
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    Swing frame control panel for brew computer
    Created with netbeans editor, but 3 step panels are replaced by
    dynamic panels
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • refreshRecipe

        public void refreshRecipe()
        Instance is created at the start of main class
        After receipt is chosen in RecipeFrame it must be updated here

      • jbConfirmSetRed

        public void jbConfirmSetRed()
        Set confirm button for manual action to red (= action required)

      • setStepsinFrame

        public void setStepsinFrame(java.lang.Integer startStep)
        Shows three brew steps on frame, previous, current and next step
        needs global variables brewRecipe which must contain the
        current brew recipe
        Parameters:
        startStep - First brew step to be shown on frame

      • setStepColor

        public void setStepColor(java.lang.Integer step,
                         java.awt.Color color)
        Set a colored border around a brew step on frame
        Used to show the active brew step
        needs global variables brewRecipe which must contain the
        current brew recipe
        Parameters:
        step - First brew step to be shown on frame
        color - Color ex. Color.green = running, Color.yellow = waiting

      • setTimeAll

        public void setTimeAll(java.lang.Integer timeinSec)
        Set time which process is running on frame in jtTimeAll
        Parameters:
        timeinSec - past time since start in seconds

      • setTimeStep

        public void setTimeStep(java.lang.Integer timeinSec)
        Set time which process step is running on frame in jtTimeStep
        Parameters:
        timeinSec - past time since start of step in seconds

      • setTempToBe

        public void setTempToBe(double temp)
        Set target temperatur of brewstep in frame in jtTempToBe
        Parameters:
        temp - temperatur in °C

      • setTempIs

        public void setTempIs(double temp)
        Set current temperatur in frame in jtTempIs
        Parameters:
        temp - temperatur in °C

      • setStatus

        public void setStatus(java.lang.String status)

      • setPump

        public void setPump(java.lang.String onoff)
        Set status of pump in frame by triggering the action button for pump
        So action buttion show the current status
        Parameters:
        onoff - ON or OFF

        Set status of heater in frame by triggering the action button for heater
        So action buttion show the current status

        onoff - ON or OFF

        Set status of heater in frame by triggering the action button for stop
        So action buttion show the current status
